casebody.data:
HASTINGS v. WARDEN OF MARYLAND HOUSE OF CORRECTION [App. No. 73,

September Term, 1962.]

Decided April 5, 1963.

Before Henderson, Hammond, Prescott, Horney and Marbury, JJ.

*626Pur Curiam.

Application for leave to appeal from a denial of post conviction relief is denied for the reasons set out in the opinion of the court below.
